title: can someone please explain to me who george soros is and what his motives are?

body: To answer this question in single post would take too long and would be inadequate. George Soros(not his real name) is a hungarian jew that is sponsoring the Black Lives Matter movement. He was also giving money to some Anti-Brexit campaign to stop UK from leaving the EU. In order to understand why he does the things he does. You need to know more about the history and nature of jews. Watch this documentary it will answer your questions better than I ever could. https://www.bitchute.com/video/s1nPYDj7KBEQ/

body:
The west and America doesn't hate Jews. You probably think that because the media constantly portrays Americans as a bunch of Nazis. The truth is, those that hate Jews are just as much of a fringe group here as anywhere else, just more vocal because the media constantly focuses on them to make America seem so bad. I can attest that me and my fellow Americans find such groups, including this guild, just as ridiculous and horrible as you do.

The riots were blamed on the radical Democrats/leftists/communist revolutionaries, not Jews. And Trump is a known Jewish and Israel supporter (you'll notice this guild despises Trump in fact) and one of his sons is Jewish.
body_html:

I can attest that me and my fellow Americans find such groups, including this guild, just as ridiculous and horrible as you do.

The riots were blamed on the radical Democrats/leftists/communist revolutionaries, not Jews. And Trump is a known Jewish and Israel supporter (you'll notice this guild despises Trump in fact) and one of his sons is Jewish.
